sentences.english: Postconditions are contracts to be met when a methods ends, and are specified with Contract.Ensures() as in the next example
sentences.chinese: 當方法結束時，後置條件表示其結果需要滿足的契約。

sentences.english: The post-position word is a kind of function word in the modern Kazakh language.
sentences.chinese: 後置詞是現代哈薩克語虛詞的一種。

sentences.english: The paper briefly introduces the main design points of the rear-mounted engine accessories on the bus.
sentences.chinese: 簡要介紹在客車上後置發動機時，其附件的設計要點。

sentences.english: And of course particular contract supplier, the post-condition is an obligation for the supplier.
sentences.chinese: 條件情況很多當然，後置條件是服務端的義務。

sentences.english: And by a machine configure file, the General postposition process is dealed with.
sentences.chinese: 實現了針對不同機牀的後置處理。

sentences.english: The quantity of the manufacturing instructions produced by postposition function is usually large.
sentences.chinese: 但經過後置處理後，生成的加工程序往往很大。

sentences.english: So pre- and post conditions are two fundamental elements of contracts.
sentences.chinese: 因此，前置和後置條件是契約理論的兩個基本要素。

sentences.english: You can also associate an event with its event handler in the code-behind. The following code shows how to do this in C#.
sentences.chinese: 同樣也可以在代碼後置文件中來關聯事件處理方法。

sentences.english: And of course, the post-condition is an obligation for the supplier.
sentences.chinese: 當然，後置條件是服務端的義務。

sentences.english: Postconditions are often expressed as assertions about method return values.
sentences.chinese: 後置條件測試通常用方法返回值的斷言來表示。

sentences.english: PPM can transform the intermediate file into an NC…
sentences.chinese: 後置處理模塊將中間代碼文件變成NC加工程序。

sentences.english: This sort of information goes in the Postconditions section.
sentences.chinese: 此類信息都應填寫在“後置條件”部分中。

sentences.english: PPM can transform the intermediate file into an NC machi…
sentences.chinese: 後置處理模塊將中間代碼文件變成NC加工程序。

sentences.english: The application of multithread in post-processing subsystem is also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了多線程技術在後置處理系統中的應用。

sentences.english: This thesis mainly discusses the post-positions of Suichang dialect, a Wu dialect.
sentences.chinese: 本文集中討論吳語遂昌話的後置成分。

sentences.english: A quick flick with our spudger disconnects the rear-facing camera.
sentences.chinese: 用撬棒輕輕彈開後置攝像頭。

pinyin: zi4 ran2 yu3 yan2 chu3 li3

definition: to interpret (a visual document, a medical exam, an historical event etc)/to analyze data (from a chip, a black box etc)
inversion (rhetoric device of inverting the word order for heightened effect)/anastrophe
